author: Sam Rowe
title: An A-List Tattoo Artist Reveals The Coolest Ink Trends Of 2017
text:
Instagram embed 
“Full black arms are definitely becoming a thing. I mean, I had my arm blacked out probably 12 years ago and a lot of older tattooists have blackened their arms purely for the fact that they got covered in so much shit over the years. But nowadays people with clean arms are solidly covering them. It’s a hardcore trend but in the fashion world, having an entirely black arm is becoming a cool thing to do. The problem with the full black arm is, putting black ink into the skin – solid, pure, clean and smooth – isn’t easy, so you really need to go to people who specialise in it. It can come out patchy, so there is a skill behind it. 
“I know Lionel Messi from Barcelona recently got a black leg, so a black limb is becoming cool now. When it’s done properly, it does look really cool. The thing with art is that it’s about grabbing your attention. You see someone with a black arm and it does draw you in. It makes you, as a body, a statement.”
